string-array.name: changelog
string-array.item: New changelog to tell you what has changed
Challenge workouts which are for a completion of total reps instead of sets
Cleaner transition between supersets when there is no rest
Reps default to the number of reps for the day rather than the number completed the last time the exercise was completed
Support multiple exercises with the same name (or the same exercise) within the same workout day
Not fixed: rotating the screen returns to the first exercise of the day
Not fixed: rotating the screen resets changes to reps/weight for incomplete sets
